        public static javafx.scene.image.ImageView add_image_to_gridpane(java.lang.String img_path,
                                                                 int fit_wdith,
                                                                 boolean preserveRatio,
                                                                 int offsetX,
                                                                 int offsetY,
                                                                 javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid)
        Display an image on a javafx gridpane and return his imageview
        Parameters:
        img_path - the string path to the image
        fit_wdith - the width to fit with
        preserveRatio - if the image should keep his ratio
        offsetX - his x position on the grid
        offsetY - his y position on the grid
        grid - the grid to add the image
        Returns:
        the imageview that has been created, if more change had to be done

        Parameters:

        fit_wdith - the width to fit with
        preserveRatio - if the image should keep his ratio
        offsetX - his x position on the grid
        offsetY - his y position on the grid
        grid - the grid to edit
        Returns:
